name: Idle Heros
description:
Welcome to 《IDLE HEROS》
Our world is being destroyed by the gods, and heroes are organizing to fight against it.
Although it is a 2D game, but has super cool combat, strategic
If you like the placement genre, give this game a try
Unique hero
IDLE HEROS currently has 27 heroes, and new heroes will be added in the future.
Each hero has his own characteristic skill, 3 optional skills, and a powerful talent tree.
Rich equipment attributes
《IDLE HEROS》There are many equipment attributes, equipment can be synthesized, different attributes can be matched with different heroes, there are many rare attributes, waiting for you to experience ~
Explore the unknown
《IDLE HEROS》Exploration gameplay is full of unknowns, rich rewards in exploration, can be synthesized, and rewards can be even richer after synthesis
Risk group
《IDLE HEROS》can form a 5 member adventure party, get bonus stats and goodies, and invite your friends to join~
